page.title: 06STRATFORD INDUSTRY
page.content: There are several{industrial}estates in this area.In one industrial estate, we visited two metal works and one brass works.One of the{metal}works made parts for{cars,machine gun stands and parts for{armoured cars.}It was too dangerous to enter the factory because of the bits of metal flying about but we had a peep in the door and saw lots of machines.The machines were boring,drilling,thread rolling, turning, milling, broaching and grinding.The factory was called{Peak {Engineering,}240 people work there. At the industrial estates they make different types of metal and wooden products etc.There is a car repair factory.Down one of the roads the factories are numbered so people can find them.A factory of interest was {Si-plan Electronics}who design and manufacture electronics equipment.
